attributes.action: stop spending our money on unjust wars
attributes.additional_details: To put it simply, I a sovereign scotam fed up looking at the news and seeing nhs and educational funding cuts, to then turn to a real news channel (RT) and seeing the men who run this illegal union handing out millions of punds worth of weapons and munitions to corrupt parliments for unjust wars. Murdering thousands of innocent people who want no more than to live in peace and freely practise religious beliefs.
